Html:
Hello,

I want to use MUI in a Client-Server Application. If I want to send the Definition to the Client I have following error:
Der Typ "FirstFloor.ModernUI.Presentation.LinkGroupCollection" in Assembly "FirstFloor.ModernUI, Version=1.0.5.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=2d21ec3cd074c59a" ist nicht als serialisierbar gekennzeichnet.
Could be to fixed it in the next releases?

My workaround is that the LinkGroupCollection will be create on Clientside - but in future I want it on serverside

Thanks
